info.author: Arthur Noel
info.description:
Makeenv is a modular framework for the automation of Python environments based
on GNU Make, virtualenv, and pip.

.. image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/0compute/makeenv.png?branch=master
    :target: http://travis-ci.org/0compute/makeenv

What?
-----

Makeenv provides virtualenv and dependency management with built in modules
for:

* Setuptools
* Test and coverage
* Documentation
* Metrics
* Distribution

Documentation
-------------

Documentation is published at `read the docs`_.

.. _read the docs: https://makeenv.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
info.keywords: make virtualenv pip automation test nose sphinx setuptools
info.name: makeenv
